entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
